          <title>
            <string language="sl">Knjižne uganke</string>
            <string language="en">Book riddles</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Buchrätsel</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Énigmes de livre</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Riddles do livro</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Riddles del libro</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αινίγματα βιβλίων</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Cribas del libro</string>
          </title>
          <language>sl</language>
          <description>
            <string language="sl">Različne uganke. Povezovanje avtorjev z njihovimi deli.</string>
            <string language="en">Different riddles related to the books (titles and their authors).</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">knjiga</string>
            <string language="en">book</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">uganka</string>
            <string language="en">riddle</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">križanka</string>
            <string language="en">crossword</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Unterschiedliche Rätsel standen auf den Büchern
in Verbindung (Namen und ihre Autoren).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Différentes énigmes liées aux livres (titres 
et leurs auteurs).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Os riddles diferentes relacionaram-se aos livros 
(títulos e seus autores).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">I riddles differenti si sono riferiti ai libri 
(titoli ed i loro autori).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Διαφορετικά αινίγματα σχετικά με τα βιβλία (τίτλοι 
και οι συντάκτες τους).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Diversas cribas relacionadas con los libros 
(títulos y sus autores).</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Buch</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Rätsel</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
